content: MFT-HP Hanger rail 22.5 Hanger rail for the concealed attachment of façade panels using hangers ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Profiles- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster, simpler cladding installation – Improved hanger rail design for hassle-free panel installation Single panel removal – these redesigned hangers are not only easier to install, but also allow you to remove single cladding panels (when fastened with fixing pins) All-weather installation – unlike adhesives, you can work with this system in virtually all weather conditions Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Total system solution – from Hilti you get optimized tools, consumables and services for every step of ventilated façade installation Applications Concealed fastening of façade cladding using mechanical fasteners for rear fixing ### TECHNICAL DATA: Height: 63.5 mm Width: 22.5 mm Length: 6000 mm Technical Data | Height | 63.5 mm | Width | 22.5 mm | Length | 6000 mm | Material composition | Aluminium EN AW-6063 T66 ### ITEMS- 2301548 - Profile MFT-HP 22,5x63,5 6m - Package Size 6 m - 2301549 - Profile MFT-HP 22,5x63,5 6m pf - Package Size 6 m - 2330613 - Profile MFT-HP 22,5x63,5 6m RAL 9005 - Package Size 6 m
